name: Paca Paca Passion Special
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

?This game is supported with the PSP® and PS Vita screenshot function?
PSP®: Screenshots can be taken by using the menu after holding the PS button (HOME button) in the game.
The image will be saved in the photo collection from the XMB™ (XrossMediaBar).
PS Vita: Screenshots can be taken by using "Screenshot" from the "Settings" after holding the PS button in the game.
The image will be saved as an application photo.

This software can be played with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
If you are downloading with PC or via PS3™, after downloading with the device please connect to PSP® with a USB cable and copy the content by inserting a storage media like Memory Stick™.

"PACAPACA PASSION™ Special" which everybody knows is now here on PlayStation®!
There will be popular mix songs and new song JET! All will be available in this PACA!!

There will be a contest mode which is popular in the game center!
You can also play the popular private extra remix too!
This will be the extreme of PACAPACA!
